reviewText: This is a great documentary. Very enjoyable. You can learn a lot of this type of job from pro/hero messengers from back then. They are fast and seem like nice people. So sad that Steve the Greek passed away. I went to his bike shop last year to buy a bike from him. Next thing I hear that same year is that he was no longer with us. He was so nice. I recommend this video to any riders or none riders both will enjoy.
An interesting, if meandering look at NYC bike courier life in the mid 90s. It ain't Citizen Kane, but it sure is fun!
